document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalogue of the Buprestidae of Iran (Coleoptera: Buprestoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalogue of the Buprestidae of Iran (Coleoptera: Buprestoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
synonym:
Phytotera Gistel 1856
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
* Trachys koenigi
Reitter 1890 c
: 146
;
Bílý 1983 a
: 86
; Kubáň 2006 : 419 ;
Bellamy 2008 d
: 2495
. synonym: utschderensis
Obenberger 1918 a
: 56
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution within Iran .
Fars (
Bílý 1983 a
), Iran (no locality cited) (
Bellamy 2008 d
).
Distribution outside Iran .
Russia (Kubáň 2006 ).

Note. Record for Iran in
Bílý ( 1983 a)
is doubtful; this species occurs in the Northern Caucasus.

Distribution within Iran .

Bílý 1983 a
).

Note.
Bracon ( Glabrobracon ) obscurator Nees, 1811
( Hymenoptera : Braconidae : Braconinae) ( 2 ♀) were collected as the parasitoid of
Trachys troglodytes
in Ourmieh (West Azarbaijan province).
